title: 'Servent' solves a problem
creator_credit: Ivor P. Kershaw and Factual Films of Australia
brief_description: A demonstration of how a newly-developed system of wiring between your house and the main electricity supply may be used to eliminate unsightly masses of wires between your home and the poles in the street. (Sponsored by Olympic Cables.)
creator_credit_for_label: Ivor P. Kershaw and Factual Films of Australia
